dict.string:
# q = command to be run via "Run in Terminal" command in Alfred on alfred_script(q) # Launch Wezterm if needed (Appname is `WezTerm`, processname is `wezterm-gui`) tell application "WezTerm" to activate tell application "System Events" repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "wezterm-gui" delay 0.05 end repeat end tell
do shell script ("export PATH=/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin/:$PATH ; echo '" & q & "' | wezterm cli send-text --no-paste") end alfred_script
